title: Gold V Support Main LF Duo/Team
body:
Gold V Support Main LF Duo/Team to climb. I mainly use discord but I can do other comms. Prefer Gold V+ ADC Duo/Team. I main {{champion:432}}  and he is my best support. I don't troll, no salt and no toxicity towards team.

Add me: Xylonia

replies.body: Hey there mate! Have you changed your name recently? can't seem to find you on the league client.
